<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1066</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gangs and You</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gruppen und Sie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Troupes et vous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grupos e você</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gruppi e voi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμμορίες και εσείς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadrillas y usted</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Could you become a member of a gang? In this activity the learners will learn about gangs, their structure and how they influence teens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">influence teens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gangs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kids at risk</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konnten Sie ein Bauteil einer Gruppe werden? 
In dieser Aktivität erlernen die Anfänger über Gruppen, ihre 
Struktur und wie sie Teens beeinflussen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourriez-vous devenir un membre d'une troupe ? 
Dans cette activité les étudiants se renseigneront sur des 
troupes, leur structure et comment ils influencent des années de 
l'adolescence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poderia você transformar-se um membro de um 
grupo? Nesta atividade os learners aprenderão sobre grupos, sua
estrutura e como influenciam teens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potreste diventare un membro di un gruppo? 
In questa attività i principianti impareranno circa i gruppi, 
la loro struttura e come influenzano gli anni dell'adolescenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θα μπορούσατε να γίνετε μέλος μιας συμμορίας; Σε
αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα μάθουν για τις συμμορίες, 
η δομή τους και πώς επηρεάζουν teens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Podría usted hacer un miembro de una cuadrilla?
En esta actividad los principiantes aprenderán sobre 
cuadrillas, su estructura y cómo influencian adolescencias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfluß Teens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gruppen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zicklein an der Gefahr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité interactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">années de l'adolescence d'influence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">troupes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gosses en danger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividade interativa</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
